price: 54. Waarlijk, dit is Onze voorziening die nooit zal eindigen;
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزۡقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lariz'qunā mā lahu min nafādin
